TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewLinkColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 表示 控件中包含链接的单元格的列。

span.span: Represents a column of cells that contain links in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是类的专用类型， 用于以逻辑方式承载响应用户单击的单元格。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that respond to user clicks. 类与 类相似，但提供了不同的用户体验，这在某些情况下可能更合适，例如显示存储在数据库表中的 URL。The class is similar to the class but provides a different user experience that may be more appropriate in certain situations, such as displaying a URL stored in a database table. 若要为每个单元格显示相同的链接文本，请将 属性设置为， `true` 并将 属性设置为所需的链接文本。To display the same link text for every cell, set the property to `true` and set the property to the desired link text. 在中，每个都与 它相交。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 此列类型的默认排序模式为 。The default sort mode for this column type is . 若要响应用户链接单击，请处理 事件。To respond to user link clicks, handle the event. 你还可以使用 事件响应单击单元格中的任意位置。You can also use the event to respond to clicks anywhere in the cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在上设置属性 。The following code example sets properties on a . 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

para.span: 当从 派生类派生并向其添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于在列的单元格中显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link within cells in the column.

value.span: ，表示用于显示选定的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.

value.span: 默认值为用户的 Internet Explorer 中对链接处于悬停状态时的颜色设置。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性 。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例对属性进行初始化 ，以便在用户选择该链接时，该链接将变为空白。The following code example initializes the property so that the link turns white when the user selects it. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
The default value is a new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的构造函数将 此属性初始化为新创建的 。The constructor for the class initializes this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元模板的属性不会立即影响用户界面 (列的现有单元的 UI) 。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 这些更改仅在重新生成列后才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过对方法的调用 ) 进行排序。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将用作的 模板 。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 对列中的任何单元格所做的样式更改都将影响列的所有单元格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

value.span: 一个指示链接行为的 值。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性 。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将此属性初始化为 ，使操作系统可以选择链接的显示方式。The following code example initializes this property to , which lets the operating system choose how the link will display. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性 。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将此属性初始化为蓝色。The following code example initializes this property to blue. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 获取或设置当 为 时，列的单元格中显示的链接文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the link text displayed in a column's cells if is .
A containing the link text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将属性设置为，则文本可见 `true` 。The text is visible if the property is set to `true`. 否则，将用 每个单元格的属性填充每个单元格的链接文本。Otherwise, each cell's link text is populated with the property of each cell. 您可以 通过 `false` 在将 "列属性" 设置为 "" 后将单元属性设置为，来覆盖单个单元格的属性值 `true` 。You can override the property value for individual cells by setting the cell property to `false` after setting the column property to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当访问链接时，该链接是否更改颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color if it has been visited.

value.span: 如果在选中链接时，该链接更改颜色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 为 true 时， 属性值用于显示已访问的链接。When is true, the property value is used to display links that have already been visited. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性 。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将初始化此属性，以便链接在选中时更改颜色。The following code example initializes this property so that the link changes color when it is selected. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property value is displayed as the link text.

value.span: 如果 属性值显示为链接文本，则为 ；如果单元格的 属性值显示为链接文本，则为 。

span.span: if the property value is displayed as the link text; if the cell property value is displayed as the link text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性 。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性 ，以便每个单元的属性（在本例中为雇员上司的雇员 ID）显示为文本链接。The following code example demonstrates how to set this property so that the property of each cell, in this case the employee ID of the employee's boss, is displayed as the text link. 选择该链接后，选择点将移到老板的姓名。After selecting the link, the selection point is moved to the boss's name. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示以前访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.

value.span: ，表示用来显示已访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.

value.span: 默认值为用户的 Internet Explorer 中对已访问过的链接的颜色设置。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该 属性设置为 false，则 忽略该属性。If the property is set to false, the property is ignored. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性 。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将初始化此属性，以便在用户访问该链接时，该链接为黄色-绿色。The following code example initializes this property so that the link is yellow-green if the user has visited it. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]
